alert.note: Alert for Bureau (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 2:31PM CDT until April 19 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL BUREAU COUNTY... At 231 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manlius, or 10 miles west of Princeton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wyanet around 235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bureau County Fairgrounds and Princeton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
